title: US Used AI To Capture Nicolás Maduro? Secret Role Of Anthropic’s Claude In High-Risk Military Raid Revealed
description: The United States military reportedly used an artificial-intelligence system developed by Anthropic during the operation that led to the capture of Venezuelan leader Nicolás Maduro.
